description:
I played this game when it first came out several years ago. I never forgot it; in fact, I even kept a copy of it, I liked it so much.

The is a very straight-forward game. You control your character the arrow keys. Gameplay consists of jumping over obstacles and dodging projectiles. All of this is very satisfying (if simple) in its own right, but where the game really shines is the atmosphere. It reminds one of the 80s, for sure, but also Halloween! It's lo-fi spooky.
This game reminds me of the old games I used to play!
summary: I loved it, makes me nostalgic

description: Not much to it, but a good Halloween game, perhaps, wonderful sound and stylized graphics, very easy to tell the difference between platforms, background, and enemies.
